poem:
Title: "In the Loom of the Unseen Atom"

This dance of atoms, cloaked in gloom,
Spectres whispering in the tribunal's room.
Twenty voting 'shame', two dismiss the tale,
While twelve, in shadowed corners, prefer to abstain.

The hushed globe watches, as Tehran stands defiant,
A silent tango with IAEA, science's giant.
Through the pall of mistrust, truth's form eludes,
In corridors of power, the unseen atom intrudes.
